item.description:
Did we say Russell? Yes we did. We're going to celebrate the New Year by playing at Russell Field, which is right off of the Alewife T stop. Why is Russell Field awesome? Because it's a large turf field, we can where cleats, and it services a good chunk of nearby Boston Frisbee members.

This is a special game day @ Russell, therefore please READ THIS CAREFULLY:


  • This is a day-time game: starts @1pm
  • Cleats are allowed, but boots are HIGHLY recommended. There will be more than a foot of snow on the field.
  • Do Not Park at the Russell Field parking lot (you could get ticketed or even towed)
  • Here's a Google Map for Locations/Directions



Afterwards, we are going over to Susan B's house (one of our kickn' organizers) for a New Year's party celebration - BF style. Susan's is just a few blocks away from the field, and we will be providing some gentle appetizer's and festive liquids. If you have anything you want to bring, then by all means.

Look forward to seeing you there!

The crew
item.how_to_find_us: When exiting the Alewife train, look at the platform sign - you will see an arrow pointing to Russell Field
item.name: Happy Frisbee New Years DAY @ Russell
